Compute local moderated T-statistics

Source: R/nifti_local_moderated_t_stat.R
nifti_local_moderated_t_stat.Rd

Compute local moderated T-statistics

Usage

nifti_local_moderated_t_stat(
  imgs,
  mask = NULL,
  nn,
  radius,
  adjust.method = "BH",
  verbose = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

imgs

List of images or character of filenames

mask

Image to subset the data

nn

nearest-neighbors computed by findNearestNeighbors

radius

Integer: Indices that dist(targetInd - queryInd) <= radius

adjust.method

method to adjust p-value, passed to topTable

verbose

Print diagnostic messages

...

additional arguments to pass to mclapply

Value

A list of output images, including the moderated T map, p-value map, adjusted p-value map, and the pseudo T map.

On this page
